response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value for me. I understand that the true worth of this item may be subjective and varies greatly depending on its purpose for you. With that in mind, I am offering you the chance to own this product at a special introductory price of $750,000. This is an exceptional deal considering the unparalleled quality and craftsmanship involved. If you decide to proceed, please let me know so we can finalize the details promptly. Should you need more information or have any specific concerns, feel free to ask. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 750000}
